name: All's Well In This Small World
name_original: All's Well In This Small World
description:
A short anti-RPG game made for RPG Biz's 2D One Map Challenge; it's also been submitted in the Apocalypse Jam.  Use the arrow keys to move and the spacebar to interact.

Update (8/10/17): I've gone through the contents of the file and chopped it down signifigantly!  The game itself has not changed in content, but it's now reduced from ~200 MB to ~10 MB.  If you run into any errors, please let me know.

I'm also considering releasing a post-jam version after the jam is over.  For now, please let me know your thoughts on it; critique is very welcome! :)
